verses.text: In the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of our \w captivity|strong="H1546"\w*, in the \w beginning|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w tenth|strong="H6218"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* was \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w*, in the \w selfsame|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was upon me, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me thither.

In the \w visions|strong="H4759"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* he me into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w set|strong="H5117"\w* me upon a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, by which \add was\add* as the \w frame|strong="H4011"\w* of a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* on the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*.\f + \fr 40.2 \ft by which: or, upon which\f*

And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me thither, and, behold, \add there was\add* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, whose \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* \add was\add* like the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, with a \w line|strong="H6616"\w* of \w flax|strong="H6593"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and a \w measuring|strong="H4060"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*; and he \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto me, \w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* with thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* with thine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* upon all that I shall \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* thee; for to the \w intent|strong="H4616"\w* that I might \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* \add them\add* unto thee \add art\add* thou \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* hither: \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* all that thou \w seest|strong="H7200"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And behold a \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* on the \w outside|strong="H2351"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and in the \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* a \w measuring|strong="H4060"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* of \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \add long\add* by the \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and an hand \w breadth|strong="H2948"\w*: so he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w building|strong="H1146"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*; and the \w height|strong="H6967"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*.

¶ Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* he unto the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* which \w looketh|strong="H6440"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w stairs|strong="H4609"\w* thereof, and \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w threshold|strong="H5592"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \add which was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*; and the \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w threshold|strong="H5592"\w* \add of the gate, which was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*.\f + \fr 40.6 \ft which looketh…: Heb. whose face was the way toward the east\f*

And \add every\add* little \w chamber|strong="H8372"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*; and between the little \w chambers|strong="H8372"\w* \add were\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w threshold|strong="H5592"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w by|strong="H0681"\w* the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*.
He \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* also the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*.

Then \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* he the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \add was\add* \w inward|strong="H1004"\w*.

And the little \w chambers|strong="H8372"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w eastward|strong="H1870"\w* \add were\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* on this \w side|strong="H6311"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* on that \w side|strong="H6311"\w*; they \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \add were\add* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w measure|strong="H4060"\w*: and the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* had \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w measure|strong="H4060"\w* on this side and on that side.

And he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; \add and\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w thirteen|strong="H7969"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

The \w space|strong="H1366"\w* also \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the little \w chambers|strong="H8372"\w* \add was\add* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \add on this side\add*, and the \w space|strong="H1366"\w* \add was\add* one \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* on that side: and the little \w chambers|strong="H8372"\w* \add were\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* on this side, and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* on that side.\f + \fr 40.12 \ft space: Heb. limit, or, bound\f*

He \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* then the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* from the \w roof|strong="H1406"\w* of \add one\add* little \w chamber|strong="H8372"\w* to the \w roof|strong="H1406"\w* of another: the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \w door|strong="H6607"\w* against \w door|strong="H6607"\w*.

He \w made|strong="H6213"\w* also \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* of \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, even unto the \w post|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

And from the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w entrance|strong="H2978"\w* unto the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \add were\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And \add there were\add* \w narrow|strong="H0331"\w* \w windows|strong="H2474"\w* to the little \w chambers|strong="H8372"\w*, and to their \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* \w within|strong="H6441"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and likewise to the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w*: and \w windows|strong="H2474"\w* \add were\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w inward|strong="H6441"\w*: and upon \add each\add* \w post|strong="H0352"\w* \add were\add* palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w*.\f + \fr 40.16 \ft narrow: Heb. closed\f*\f + \fr 40.16 \ft arches: or, galleries, or, porches\f*\f + \fr 40.16 \ft inward: or, within\f*

Then \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* he me into the \w outward|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, and, lo, \add there were\add* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, and a \w pavement|strong="H7531"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* \add were\add* upon the \w pavement|strong="H7531"\w*.

And the \w pavement|strong="H7531"\w* by the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \add was\add* the \w lower|strong="H8481"\w* \w pavement|strong="H7531"\w*.

Then he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* from the \w forefront|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w lower|strong="H8481"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* unto the \w forefront|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w eastward|strong="H6921"\w* and \w northward|strong="H6828"\w*.\f + \fr 40.19 \ft without: or, from without\f*

¶ And the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w outward|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* that \w looked|strong="H6440"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 40.20 \ft that looked: Heb. whose face was\f*

And the little \w chambers|strong="H8372"\w* thereof \add were\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* on this side and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* on that side; and the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof and the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof were after the \w measure|strong="H4060"\w* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof \add was\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.\f + \fr 40.21 \ft arches: or, galleries, or, porches\f*

And their \w windows|strong="H2474"\w*, and their \w arches|strong="H0361"\w*, and their palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w*, \add were\add* after the \w measure|strong="H4060"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* that \w looketh|strong="H6440"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*; and they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto it by \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*; and the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof \add were\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.

And the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add was\add* over against the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and toward the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*; and he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* from \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* to \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

¶ After that he \w brought|strong="H3212"\w* me \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w south|strong="H1864"\w*, and behold a \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w south|strong="H1864"\w*: and he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof and the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof according to these \w measures|strong="H4060"\w*.

And \add there were\add* \w windows|strong="H2474"\w* in it and in the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, like those \w windows|strong="H2474"\w*: the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* \add was\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And \add there were\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w* to go \w up|strong="H5930"\w* to it, and the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof \add were\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them: and it had palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* on this side, and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* on that side, upon the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof.

And \add there was\add* a \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* in the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w south|strong="H1864"\w*: and he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* from \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* to \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w south|strong="H1864"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me to the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* by the \w south|strong="H1864"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: and he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w south|strong="H1864"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* according to these \w measures|strong="H4060"\w*;

And the little \w chambers|strong="H8372"\w* thereof, and the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof, and the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof, according to these \w measures|strong="H4060"\w*: and \add there were\add* \w windows|strong="H2474"\w* in it and in the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: \add it was\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*.

And the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \add were\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*.\f + \fr 40.30 \ft broad: Heb. breadth\f*

And the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof \add were\add* toward the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*; and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w* \add were\add* upon the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof: and the going \w up|strong="H4608"\w* to it \add had\add* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*.

¶ And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me into the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*: and he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* according to these \w measures|strong="H4060"\w*.

And the little \w chambers|strong="H8372"\w* thereof, and the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof, and the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof, \add were\add* according to these \w measures|strong="H4060"\w*: and \add there were\add* \w windows|strong="H2474"\w* therein and in the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: \add it was\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*.

And the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof \add were\add* toward the \w outward|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*; and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w* \add were\add* upon the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof, on this side, and on that side: and the going \w up|strong="H4608"\w* to it \add had\add* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*.
¶ And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me to the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \add it\add* according to these \w measures|strong="H4060"\w*;

The little \w chambers|strong="H8372"\w* thereof, the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof, and the \w arches|strong="H0361"\w* thereof, and the \w windows|strong="H2474"\w* to it round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* \add was\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof \add were\add* toward the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*; and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w* \add were\add* upon the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* thereof, on this side, and on that side: and the going \w up|strong="H4608"\w* to it \add had\add* \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w steps|strong="H4609"\w*.

And the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* and the \w entries|strong="H6607"\w* thereof \add were\add* by the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, where they \w washed|strong="H1740"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

¶ And in the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \add were\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H7979"\w* on this side, and two \w tables|strong="H7979"\w* on that side, to \w slay|strong="H7819"\w* thereon the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* and the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w*.

And at the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, as one goeth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w entry|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \add were\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H7979"\w*; and on the \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w side|strong="H3802"\w*, which \add was\add* at the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \add were\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H7979"\w*.\f + \fr 40.40 \ft as one…: or, at the step\f*

\w Four|strong="H0702"\w* \w tables|strong="H7979"\w* \add were\add* on this side, and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w tables|strong="H7979"\w* on that side, by the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*; \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* \w tables|strong="H7979"\w*, whereupon they \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* \add their sacrifices\add*.

And the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w tables|strong="H7979"\w* \add were\add* of \w hewn|strong="H1496"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w* for the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, of a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and an \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, and a \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* and an \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w cubit|strong="H0520"\w* \w high|strong="H1363"\w*: whereupon also they \w laid|strong="H3240"\w* the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* wherewith they \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*.

And \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \add were\add* \w hooks|strong="H8240"\w*, \w an|strong="H0259"\w* \w hand|strong="H2948"\w* broad, \w fastened|strong="H3559"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: and upon the \w tables|strong="H7979"\w* \add was\add* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of the \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*.\f + \fr 40.43 \ft hooks: or, andirons, or, the two hearthstones\f*

¶ And \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \add were\add* the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* of the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* in the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, which \add was\add* at the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*; and their \w prospect|strong="H6440"\w* \add was\add* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w south|strong="H1864"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* at the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \add having\add* the \w prospect|strong="H6440"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto me, \w This|strong="H2090"\w* \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w*, whose \w prospect|strong="H6440"\w* \add is\add* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w south|strong="H1864"\w*, \add is\add* for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 40.45 \ft charge: or, ward, or, ordinance\f*

And the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* whose \w prospect|strong="H6440"\w* \add is\add* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \add is\add* for the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: these \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* among the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, which come \w near|strong="H7131"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto him.

So he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, and an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*, \w foursquare|strong="H7251"\w*; and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \add that was\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

¶ And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me to the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \add each\add* \w post|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w*, \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* on this side, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* on that side: and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \add was\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* on this side, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* on that side.

The \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* \w eleven|strong="H6249"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and \add he brought me\add* by the \w steps|strong="H4609"\w* whereby they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to it: and \add there were\add* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* by the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* on this side, and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* on that side.
